message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.DS, cs.NI 

The paper discusses the use of runtime systems and recomender systems for adaptive compositional modeling on the Grid. This involves addressing operational issues underlying grid computations and accommodating diverse application scenarios. The paper also discusses the use of Weaves, a source-language independent parallel runtime compositional framework, and a sophisticated checkpointing and runtime migration solution. Based on these aspects, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC), Software Engineering (cs.SE), Programming Languages (cs.PL), Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS), and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI).
